Name: Titan Debug
Description: Adds options for servers to fix various titan-related bugs and exploits.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_base
ConVars.Description: 0: Sets all debug options off. 1: Sets all debug options on. 2: Sets recommended debug options on.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_doom_skip_fix
ConVars.Description: Fixes an infrequent case where Doom state can be skipped, killing the titan instantly.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_ai_dodge_friendly
ConVars.Description: AI no longer dodge from friendly damage over time effects, such as Electric Smoke.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_melee_single_hit
ConVars.Description: Fixes melee dealing damage twice if certain entities were hit in the same swing, such as drones and Tripwire.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_termination_fix_suite
ConVars.Description: Tone Prime termination doesn't set mag to 10; Laser Shots don't cost Ion energy during terminations; Ion Prime termination doesn't get a free core if the victim disconnects; Vortex cannot catch rockets from Tone Prime and Northstar Prime terminations.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_wave_no_spawn_despawn
ConVars.Description: Fixes wave attacks despawning when used on top of Particle defensives (Particle Wall, Gun Shield).

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_wave_no_block_despawn
ConVars.Description: Fixes wave attacks occasionally being despawned when blocked by Vortex and Thermal Shield.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_wave_single_hit
ConVars.Description: Fixes Arc Wave and Flame Core being able to hit a titan twice if they embark or disembark on top of it.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_beam_single_hit
ConVars.Description: Fixes Laser Shot and Energy Siphon occasionally hitting the same target twice in a single shot.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_particle_projectile_damage
ConVars.Description: Preserves projectile effects and includes damage dropoff when damaging particles defensives, such as Particle Wall and Gun Shield.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_ion_embark_energy
ConVars.Description: Preserves Ion's energy between disembarks and embarks instead of giving full energy.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_split_shot_damage
ConVars.Description: Fixes Splitter Rifle firing split shots without the correct damage reduction.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_entangled_aegis_split_shot
ConVars.Description: When Aegis ranks are on, fixes the energy generated by Splitter Rifle split shots.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_vortex_carry_effects
ConVars.Description: Preserves projectile effects when reflected by Vortex, such as Amped Weapons, Wildfire, Enhanced Payload, etc.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_vortex_railgun_one_charge
ConVars.Description: Corrects reflected railgun damage to the base 1 charge damage, instead of using 0 charge damage.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_vortex_amplifier_projectiles
ConVars.Description: Applies Vortex Amplifier to projectiles as well, rather than only hitscans.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_vortex_no_catch_friendly
ConVars.Description: Disables Vortex catching friendly hitscan bullets to match projectile catching behavior.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_vortex_tether_damage
ConVars.Description: Fixes Tether Traps reflected by Vortex becoming invincible.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_laser_shot_need_energy
ConVars.Description: Requires energy to fire Laser Shot, not just to pull it out. Prevents the Zero-Point Laser bug. (Still appears on client, but does no damage)

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_vtol_hover_no_jamming
ConVars.Description: Fixes Flight Core movement speed being lowered if Hover ends while it's active.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_flight_core_no_railgun
ConVars.Description: Fixes activating Flight Cores back-to-back (when using high core gain) not giving the Flight Core rocket weapon.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_thermite_tick_rate
ConVars.Description: Fixes thermite occasionally dealing damage at a lower rate than normal. (Mainly an issue on Northstar servers)

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_canister_half_block
ConVars.Description: Limits defensives to only block half of Gas Canisters when ignited so they cannot despawn the entire trap.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_canister_single_ignite
ConVars.Description: Fixes Gas Canisters getting ignited multiple times when lit in certain ways.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_canister_no_expiration_damage
ConVars.Description: Fixes Gas Canister expiration damage ignoring Tempered Plating and dealing more damage than it should.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_canister_no_double_tick
ConVars.Description: Prevents Gas Canister from dealing titan damage twice as fast sometimes. Increases Canister titan damage by 25% to compensate.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_flame_core_spread
ConVars.Description: Fixes Flame Core wave becoming narrower if the user looks up or down.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_phase_force_rodeo_off
ConVars.Description: Causes Phase Dash (and other forms of Phase) to force enemy rodeo pilots off, preventing Ronin from obtaining a battery for free.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_salvo_core_no_despawn
ConVars.Description: Fixes Salvo Core firing no more missiles if there are 0 missiles alive at any point during the Core.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_tracker_rockets_fix_notification
ConVars.Description: Fixes the Tracker Rockets locked notification on victims not disappearing when it should.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_tracker_rockets_disembark_clear_locks
ConVars.Description: Removes Tracker Rocket locks upon disembark, preventing multiple salvos from being fired off a single lock.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_tracker_rockets_no_orbital
ConVars.Description: Limits Tracker Rocket lifetime to 7s to prevent them from flying into the sky and retracking their target.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_sonar_pulse_fix_melee_lock
ConVars.Description: Fixes Sonar Pulse suffering an invisible 15s cooldown if melee canceled.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_power_shot_unlock_disembark
ConVars.Description: Fixes Power Shot preventing the player from disembarking if they died or a round ended mid-charge.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_energy_transfer_hit_detection
ConVars.Description: Adds lag compensation for Energy Transfer hits on friendly titans.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_rearm_no_instant
ConVars.Description: Prevents Rearm from activating instantly if initiated two times in quick succession via a melee cancel.

ConVars.Name: titan_debug_survival_undoom_fix
ConVars.Description: Fixes Survival of the Fittest undooming in the same server tick as Monarch is doomed granting one bar max health.
